---


Updated the background color to silver white (#E8E8E8) throughout the application. Changes made:

1. **`app/globals.css`**: Updated the `--background` CSS variable from dark blue (`#0A0F1C`) to silver white (`#E8E8E8`), and adjusted the foreground color to dark (`#1A1A1A`) for contrast.

2. **`app/page.tsx`**: Changed both the loading state and main page background from `bg-[#0A0F1C]` to `bg-[#E8E8E8]`, and updated text color from `text-white` to `text-black`.

3. **`app/post/page.tsx`**: Updated background and text colors.

4. **`app/confirmation/page.tsx`**: Updated background and text colors.

Background is now silver white across all pages. Text colors were adjusted to black for readability. No linter errors.

Reverted the background and changed it to gray (#808080) across the application. Updates:

1. **`app/globals.css`**: Changed `--background` from silver white to gray (`#808080`) and set `--foreground` to light (`#F4F4F4`) for contrast.

3. **`app/post/page.tsx`**: Updated background and text colors.

4. **`app/confirmation/page.tsx`**: Updated background and text colors.

All pages now use a gray background with white text. No linting errors.
